fields.text: I played this for 10 hours a day, every weekday and even more on the weekend. Needless to say this game is awesome but too addictive
This game was waay too big. I prefer the first game
My students havent stopped talking about this Witchie fella. He's alright I guess

fields.header: A crunchy start to a great franchise
fields.text: Commander Shepard looks busted, the gameplay is okay, but man the story.

fields.header: Don't talk to me I play Apex legends
fields.text: Grahtata, Skibedip. Those are some of the excellent noises you hear in this game
When I'm feeling impatient and jittery, I pop this game in play for an hour and boom i'm cured
They didn't have to do him like that ;-;
You have to kill the Shop Keeper. He's not a true friend so its okay
I felt bad for the dude, even though I beat him upside the head two games ago
